mapper.select: select fs.id as friednshipId, fs.my_id as mySelfId, fs.friend_id as myFriendId, u.face as myFriendFace, u.nickname as myFriendNickname, fs.friend_remark as myFriendRemark, u.chat_bg as chatBg, fs.is_msg_ignore as isMsgIgnore, fs.is_black as isBlack from friendship fs left join users u on fs.friend_id = u.id where fs.my_id = #{paramMap.myId}
